testimonial.title: User Experience
testimonial.subtitle: From Our Customers
testimonial.description: Real user continuous praise, through crystal clear experience to tell them the efficient collaboration with Popo

testimonials.name: Andy Liu
testimonials.text: The Popo translation customer service system is very solid, satisfying the core needs of two-way real-time translation, multi-account unified management, and unlimited multi-opening. WhatsApp/Telegram/Line and other channels are supported, which is very friendly to the startup team, saving costs while significantly improving efficiency, and it's worth trying.

testimonials.name: Jackson
testimonials.text: We do advertising promotion, and after applying the Popo translation customer service system solution, the traffic settlement data is very clear and transparent, and the company team's external customer service and time management have been greatly improved, becoming an indispensable tool for our business! The customer satisfaction with our service has been greatly improved!

testimonials.name: Barton
testimonials.text: When a customer has new messages, the Popo system will notify me in real time, and also support real-time translation, so that we can communicate seamlessly with customers in any language, avoiding customer loss. Overall, I think the Popo customer marketing system is the best software for our e-commerce independent site to generate more sales and provide excellent customer service.

testimonials.name: David
testimonials.text: As the CEO of a foreign trade company, I am confident in the international business of my company. Popo has provided us with a great tool to help our team communicate seamlessly with global customers and suppliers. Its multi-language support and social APP integration make our business more competitive internationally, and the customer notes function is also practical, promoting the growth and success of the company

footer.slogan: Break Language Barriers, Track Global Opportunities
